Nothing.name: Nothing
Nothing.description: Parent type for all falsy values.

NotFound.name: NotFound
NotFound.description: Value returned by lookup functions in case nothing is found.

NeedComputing.name: NeedComputing
NeedComputing.description: State of the Box in case it need some computing.

Pending.name: Pending
Pending.description: State of the Box when it awaits input.

Stop.name: Stop
Stop.description: Value used to stop iterationin .each() and similar functions.

Something.name: Something
Something.description: Parent type for all non falsy values.

Obj.name: Obj
Obj.description: Parent type for all composite types.

Box.name: Box
Box.description: Observable component for declarative style programming.

Single.name: Single
Single.description: Parent type for all non composite types.

functions.name: equal
functions.description: Checks if two values are equal.
functions.source:
(a, b) => a === b ||
      (a && a._isAnything ? a._value : a) === (b && b._isAnything ? b._value : b)

functions.source: (z, n) => { n > z() && z(n); return z._parent || z; }

functions.name: setMin
functions.source: (z, n) => { n < z() && z(n); return z._parent || z; }

functions.name: trimLeft

functions.source: (s, n, tale) => s.length > n ? s.substr(0, n) + (tale || '') : s

functions.description: Map provided collection with provided function and add result as children.
